SEARCH
Package movielist

Class UserManager

java.lang.Object
movielist.UserManager
public class UserManager extends Object
The UserManager class handles operations like loading users from the database, adding and removing users, and managing in-memory storage of User objects. This class interacts with the DatabaseManager to get and utilize user information, and also manages user-related logic used throughout the application.

    Constructs a UserManager with a reference to the database manager.

  • Method Details

    • loadAllUsers

      public void loadAllUsers()
      Loads all users and their associated movies from the database into the in-memory userDatabase map.

    • addUser

      public boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user to both the database and the in-memory user database.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully added; false if the username already exists or an error occurs

    • getUser

      public User getUser(String userId)
      Retrieves a user from the in-memory user database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the username of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the User object, or null if not found

    • isUsernameAvailable

      public boolean isUsernameAvailable(String username)
      Checks if a username is available.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to check
      Returns:
      true if the username is available; false otherwise

    • getAllUsers

      public List<User> getAllUsers()
      Returns a list of all users stored in memory.
      Returns:
      a List of all users

    • removeUser

      public boolean removeUser(String username)
      Removes a user from both the database and the in-memory user map.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user to remove
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully removed; false otherwise

    • loadUsersFromDatabase

      public void loadUsersFromDatabase()
      Loads users and their favorite movies from the database and stores them in the in-memory user database.

    • getAllUsersFromDatabase

      public List<User> getAllUsersFromDatabase()
      Retrieves all users and their favorite movies from the database. (does not modify the in-memory user map)
      Returns:
      a List of users populated with their favorite movies
